en-US.summary: A voice-first study partner for high school students
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Homework Coach for my daily plan
Alexa, ask Homework Coach to start a Pomodoro session
Alexa, ask Homework Coach to quiz me
en-US.name: Homework Coach
en-US.description: Your AI-powered study partner for high school. Homework Coach helps you organize daily assignments, practice focused Pomodoro sessions, build knowledge with spaced-repetition micro-quizzes, and track your daily productivity. Perfect for students juggling multiple classes and deadlines.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Test the skill by invoking with 'Alexa, open Homework Coach'. Try: 1) Daily plan check-in, 2) Adding an assignment, 3) Starting a Pomodoro session, 4) Taking a quiz, 5) Requesting end-of-day recap.
